name: Nuclear Safety
description:
A tower defence game made in unity made for lost relic game jam:

Evil drillbots wants your reactor energy, destroy them at all cost and harvest their energy, but beware you need to be connected to your towers to power them.

Special thanks to the following external sources:

https://fontzone.net - for the Reactor and Juno Reactor fonts

https://pixabay.com/ - AleXZavesa - Cyberpunk 2099 (Menu Music)

https://pixabay.com/  - FASSounds - Cyber Race (Game Music)
